Name: Cyber Utopia
About the game: The main character is Naomi. She does not remember anything from her past and does not understand how she was here. She will have to break through all the tests and find out what is really going on. Immerse yourself in the world of Cyber Utopia! Cyber Utopia is a first-person shooter, made in a pastiche, old-school style in the setting of cyber punk. Actions unfold in the distant future, when the technology developed to such an extent that people began to turn into cyborgs. Key Features Old school graphics Many different weapons Hardcore gameplay Nice pixel graphics
